summary: This is my shot at making a gameplay fantasy ENB
descriptionHtml:
This is my shot at making a gameplay fantasy ENB!

I made this for the newest version of ENB, i dont know if i would call this a performance ENB, but i do get 40-60 fps with my gtx 880m, but try it out and see what fps you get enjoy!
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
(( feel free to reccomend some mods for this ENB and i wil take a look at them :) ))
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
(( Recommended mods ))
Climates of tamriel
enhanced lighting and FX
or
RLO ( if you want darker caves )
Realistic water two ( with ENB textures )
Skyrim Flora Overhaul ( 2.0 Alpha )

{{{{{ THIS IS EXTREMLY EARLY IN DEVELOPMENT }}}}}


Feel free to add some images if you want :)

[[ Installation ]]
1. first download the ENB binary 254 at enbdev.com
2. then open the wrapper folder and copy ENBhost and d3d9.dll into your skyrim folder where tesv.exe is located
3. then download Nassadross ENB and copy all the files into your skyrim folder just like you did with d3d9.dll
4. DONE! have fun :D

[[ In your skyrim launcher you must set the shadows to minimum medium or else the shadows will look weird ]]

造造[ INI TWEAKS :D ]造造
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
{{THESE MUST BE SET FOR THE ENB TO WORK CORRECTLY!}}
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bDrawShadows=1

And now you are so close to be finished!
you just need to disable antialiasing and antistropic filtering in the skyrim launcher!'
DONE! HAVE FUN :DD

( credits )
Boris - for ENBseries
Matso
Ewi65
author: Nassadross

files.name: Nassadross ENB v2
files.changelogHtml: i have made everything a little less yellow when its sunrise and sunset

files.name: Nassadross ENB v4
files.changelogHtml: I have added sweetFX and tweaked the sun colors and tweaked the daytime so just looks better also the nights are now darker so thats a plus to!
